S.F. Blake</small> tribus=[[Coreopsideae]]ref name=x
'''''Selleophytum''''' is a [[genus]] of flowering plants in the [[Coreopsideae|tickseed tribe]] within the [[Asteraceae|daisy family]].ref name=z[http://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/page/353759#page/490/mode/1up Urban, Ignatz. 1915. Repertorium Specierum Novarum Regni Vegetabilis 13: 483-484] in Latin</ref>ref[http://www.tropicos.org/Name/40035057 Tropicos, ''Selleophytum'' Urb.]</ref>
;Species The only known species is '''''[[Selleophytum buchii]],''''' native to [[Haiti]] and the [[Dominican Republic]].ref name=xref name=zref[http://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/page/381960#page/766/mode/1up Blake, Sydney Fay. 1924. Contributions from the United States National Herbarium 22(8): 641â€“642] in Englisy</ref> ==References== reflist [[Category:Coreopsideae]] [[Category:Asteraceae genera]] [[Category:Flora of Hispaniola]]
